txt.en: 'It is true! Others approach!'
'Do you dare to attempt entering here?'
'Well done, indeed. I am impressed that such a deed was accomplished by the likes of you.'
'We are exposed. We need to go!'
'What is happening? Help us!'
'Welcome to Azanarukâr. There is much to talk about. Will you come with us?'
'Attack before we are seen! We must cleanse this cave!'
'Watch your flanks! If he attacks, we must be ready!'
'He comes! Get ready!'
'Something terrible remains here where none should dwell. I must go for help! Be careful as you move deeper.'
'The flame returns!'
'The darkness will envelop you!'
'Let us leave this place, [placeholder]. We have been too long in the presence of this evil, and my heart longs for relief from the dread of it.'

'Back! You will never defile me with your poison! Good, they are gone; I am relieved. I thought for certain I would become like them: a monstrosity. They came upon me unaware, surrounding me and taking me captive. One hears rumours of such twisted fates, but now I have seen the wicked pool of filth that corrupts the very depths of this place -- I saw it with my own eyes.

'I will give you a moment to collect your thoughts, and then you must follow me. We will crush these monsters before they can corrupt aught else beyond this wicked place. This will be a great task. I can only imagine what horrors we will face as we penetrate the area.

'Hurry; gather your wits and make ready!'
'I have returned with help, [placeholder]!'
Defeated Moria Orc-berserkers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Magor has died.
'You ruin our fun! I like seeing them splash about!'
'You will go no further.'
The Elves of Lothlórien have sent you deep into Azanarukâr to find out what has happened to Magor and discover what is really going on in the unmapped depths.
'I see. Simply put, your death approaches from behind. You will be safe with us.'
Amidst the screams of captured Orcs from close by, an Elven cry reaches your ears.
'This way.'
'Why did he bring us here?'
'Someone approaches!'
'Leave me. I done.'
'They too easily trusted us to help.... '
'Dhugluk told us to stay here, so here we stay!'
'Beware!'
'Dhugluk is very strong, I am not worried.'
Defeat Moria Orc-berserkers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Do not question Dhugluk!  He is no fool!'
Talk to Magor, the Elven prisoner
'Let them feel the power of the shadows!'
'I hope Dhugluk is fast with this errand. I don't like this place any more than you do.'
Help Magor clear the evil from Azanarukâr
'Darkness will now be your punishment.'
'Show them why they should fear the dark!'
'I smell Elf-trickery behind my capture!'
'This is enough! We did not stand guard all these years to be thwarted by mortals!'
'How did they fool us so? We must kill the Elf and make the Rogmul happy!'
'Why do the Rogmul take all the Orcs away?'
'Tell me what you know, Elf!'
'Run for your life!'
'Stay alert! I don't trust those things!'
'Did you see something?'
'Someone's coming! Be quiet!'
'This place makes me uneasy!'
'Mazog really wants their help?'
'Why are we even here?'
Upon entering Azanarukâr, you are confronted with the battallions of Mazog's elite troops.  The Elves have asked you to remove the threat of Mazog in Azanarukâr by defeating their leaders.

You have defeated the leaders of the Moria Orcs that Mazog sent to Azanarukâr and found Magor, the lost Elf. Now, Magor wants you to help him defeat the Nameless creatures that dwell deep in Azanarukâr. He will need assistance in putting an end to the scourge.
Magor has helped you clear the way to a darker deeper lair. Sensing great danger, he has gone for help, leaving you to seek out the new threat. Seek out the evil ahead and defeat it.
You have killed two great Regmyl that have claimed to guard Azanarukâr for a long time. You hear horrible bellowing roars ahead and can only guess at what danger lurks behind the next turn.
'We must be careful here. Something stirs below....'
'Things that dwell in the dark shall now know fear!'
'Enough of this! Fire will burn you all!'
'Feel the flame's caress!'
'Make them understand our power!'
'Intruders! Globsnaga to me!'
'Idiots! Do not taunt them! They will be ours soon enough. Let Her fungus do its work.'
'Why do we trust you? Why not talk here?'
Instance: New Devilry
'So be it then. Lead the way.'
'We will protect our new lord. You or us! Decide.'
'Yes. Good. Swim for your lives, foolish Orcs.'
